name: font-preview.defaultTab
desc: Controls the starting tab of the preview.

name: font-preview.useWorker
desc: If enabled, VS Code will try to use a worker when loading the font. Fonts may load faster, but you may also see a small shift while the font loads. Disable this setting if you notice any weird behavior.

name: font-preview.showGlyphWidth
desc: Show the glyph's width in the cell.

name: font-preview.showGlyphIndex
desc: Show the index of the glyph in the left corner of the cell.
